nodes.text: Resilon was a mining world located in the Bortele sector of the Mid Rim.

Resilon was inhabited by sentient organics and their droids who worked in the planet's mines. The 8D smelter droids once led a droid revolt against their owners. They demanded to be treated fairly and refuse to work until they were guaranteed such treatment. Although it was not confirmed, the 8D smelter droids seemed to be involved in the death of one of their
owners during the revolt.
